ComicInfo.Title: Cue Cards for Everyone; The Day Bazman Almost Went Bats!; Protest Signs Unlimited or Picket -- It's Now Cricket!; A Picture Is Worth 1,000 Lies; Famous Scenes from Great Desert Island Movies (That Just Missed!); French Forlorn Legion; King of the Mafia; Rowan and Martin's Laugh-In; Special Clocks for Different Jobs; The Hippies' Illustrated Dictionary; Mini-Everything!!; Bonnie and Clyde!
ComicInfo.Summary:
British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.Bazman hears someone calling for help and begins to don his costume, but the voice dies away before he's done dressing so he gives up and goes back to his newspaper.
Army/war satire set in the Middle East, with racist imagery.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:45:12. [Issue ID 250434]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,Lugoze,John Langton,Art Pottier,Vic Martin
ComicInfo.Inker: Charlie Rodrigues,Bill Ward,John Severin,Lugoze,John Langton,Art Pottier,Vic Martin
